Key Match Events: RJ Barrett suffered a right shoulder contusion on an illegal screen from Jonas Valančiūnas in the second quarter.
Jamal Shead stole a pass on the first possession he was on the floor, and got another steal a few moments later.
Pre-Game Insights: The Raptors start the year playing 15 of their first 20 games against playoff teams from last season.
Coach Darko Rajaković mentioned how Mitchell and Shead can push each other as the team prioritizes on-ball defence.
Post-Match Reflections: RJ Barrett will be re-evaluated Monday, which is not the 'It's fine' the Raptors would have preferred.
Boucher is in the final season of his three-year deal.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Raptors won 125-98 against the Washington Wizards.
The crowd sang 'O Canada' in French during the anthem.
Jamal Shead finished with 10 points, four assists, and three steals.
Others: The Raptors used their second of three second-round picks on Jamal Shead.
Bruce Brown (arthroscopic knee surgery) and first-round pick Ja’Kobe Walter (AC joint strain) are also out.
